Body.Content:
We are announcing the create and edit expressions with Copilot feature for Power Automate. With this feature, makers can create, edit, and fix their Power Automate expressions by invoking Copilot. This feature will reach general availability on September 15, 2024.

How does this affect me?
Makers can create complex expressions or edit their existing expressions simply by submitting natural language prompts to Copilot in Power Automate.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

For more information on this feature, please visit Create and edit expressions with Copilot.
